alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued May 08 at 4:40PM EDT until May 10 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Warning, 2 to 3 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...James City, Surry, Newport News, Hampton/Poquoson, Isle of Wight, York and Norfolk/Portsmouth Counties, and Chesapeake and Suffolk. * WHEN...Until noon EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate to severe flooding will cause extensive inundation and flooding of numerous roads and buildings resulting in a significant threat to property and life. Water will be 2 to 3 feet or more above ground level in some areas. Moderate to severe flooding will extend inland from the waterfront and shoreline flooding homes, businesses, and neighborhoods. Numerous roads will likely be closed under several feet of water. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. JAMES RIVER AT SCOTLAND/JAMESTOWN VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 4.5 FT, MAJOR 5.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/06 PM 4.6 2.4 3.1 1 MODERATE 09/06 AM 5.4 3.2 3.5 1 MAJOR 09/07 PM 5.2 3.0 3.6 1 MAJOR 10/07 AM 5.5 3.3 3.6 1 MAJOR 10/08 PM 5.2 3.0 3.4 1 MAJOR 11/08 AM 4.9 2.7 3.1 1 MODERATE SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
